name.ja: ストリームクリーナー
name.th: น้ำยาทำความสะอาดสตรีม

short.ar: يساعدك امتداد أنظف الدفق على منع Twitch.TV ADS.
short.am: የዥረት ማጽጃ ቅጥያ የእንጨት በተራሮች .TV ማስታወቂያዎችን ለማገድ ይረዳዎታል.
short.bg: Разширението на почистващия поток ви помага да блокирате twitch.tv реклами.
short.bn: স্ট্রিম ক্লিনার এক্সটেনশন আপনাকে টুইচ.টিভি বিজ্ঞাপনগুলি ব্লক করতে সহায়তা করে।
short.ca: L’extensió del netejador de flux us ajuda a bloquejar els anuncis de Twitch.tv.
short.cs: Rozšíření čističe proudu vám pomůže blokovat Twitch.tv ADS.
short.da: Stream Cleaner Extension hjælper dig med at blokere Twitch.tv -annoncer.
short.de: Mit der Stream Cleaner -Erweiterung können Sie Twitch.tv -Anzeigen blockieren.
short.el: Η επέκταση καθαρισμού ροής σας βοηθά να αποκλείσετε τις διαφημίσεις twitch.tv.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fi: The Stream Cleaner extension helps you block Twitch.tv ads.
short.es,es_419: La extensión del limpiador de la corriente le ayuda a bloquear twitch.tv anuncios.
short.et: Voopuhari laiendus aitab teil tõmbleda.TV reklaamid.
short.fa: پسوند تمیز کننده جریان به شما کمک می کند تا تبلیغات twitch.tv را مسدود کنید.
short.fil: Ang stream cleaner extension ay tumutulong sa iyo na harangan ang mga ad ng twitch.tv.
short.fr: L'extension de nettoyage de flux vous aide à bloquer Twitch.TV Ads.
short.gu: સ્ટ્રીમ ક્લીનર એક્સ્ટેંશન તમને Twitch.tv જાહેરાતો અવરોધિત કરવામાં સહાય કરે છે.
short.he: סיומת ניקוי הזרם עוזרת לך לחסום מודעות Twitch.tv.
short.hi: स्ट्रीम क्लीनर एक्सटेंशन आपको Twitch.tv विज्ञापनों को ब्लॉक करने में मदद करता है।
short.hr: Proširenje čišćenja struje pomaže vam da blokirate Twitch.tv oglase.
short.hu: A Stream Cleaner kiterjesztés segít blokkolni a Twitch.tv hirdetéseket.
short.id: Ekstensi pembersih aliran membantu Anda memblokir iklan Twitch.tv.
short.it: L'estensione del pulitore del flusso ti aiuta a bloccare gli annunci Twitch.tv.
short.ja: ストリームクリーナー拡張機能は、Twitch.tv広告をブロックするのに役立ちます。
short.kn: ಸ್ಟ್ರೀಮ್ ಕ್ಲೀನರ್ ವಿಸ್ತರಣೆಯು ಟ್ವಿಚ್.ಟಿವಿ ಜಾಹೀರಾತುಗಳನ್ನು ನಿರ್ಬಂಧಿಸಲು ನಿಮಗೆ ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡುತ್ತದೆ.
short.ko: 스트림 클리너 확장은 Twitch.tv 광고를 차단하는 데 도움이됩니다.
short.lt: Srauto valymo plėtinys padeda blokuoti „Twitch.TV“ skelbimus.
short.lv: Straumes tīrītāja pagarinājums palīdz bloķēt twitch.tv reklāmas.
short.ml: Twitt.tv പരസ്യങ്ങൾ തടയാൻ സ്ട്രീം ക്ലീനർ വിപുലീകരണം സഹായിക്കുന്നു.
short.mr: प्रवाह क्लीनर विस्तार आपल्याला ट्विच.टीव्ही जाहिराती अवरोधित करण्यात मदत करते.
short.ms: Pelanjutan Cleaner Stream membantu anda menyekat iklan Twitch.tv.
short.nl: De streamreinige extensie helpt u om Twitch.TV -advertenties te blokkeren.
short.no: Stream Cleaner -forlengelsen hjelper deg med å blokkere Twitch.tv -annonser.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie strumienia pomaga zablokować reklamy Twitch.TV.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão do limpador de fluxos ajuda a bloquear os anúncios Twitch.TV.
short.ro: Extensia de curățare a fluxului vă ajută să blocați anunțurile Twitch.TV.
short.ru: Расширение очистителя потока помогает вам блокировать рекламу Twitch.tv.
short.sk: Rozšírenie čističa toku vám pomôže zablokovať reklamy Twitch.TV.
short.sl: Podaljšek za čiščenje toka vam pomaga blokirati oglase Twitch.TV.
short.sr: Проширење чистача потока помаже вам да блокирате Твитцһ.ТВ огласе.
short.sv: Strömrengöringsförlängningen hjälper dig att blockera twitch.tv -annonser.
short.sw: Ugani wa kusafisha mkondo hukusaidia kuzuia matangazo ya Twitch.tv.
short.ta: ஸ்ட்ரீம் கிளீனர் நீட்டிப்பு twitch.tv விளம்பரங்களைத் தடுக்க உதவுகிறது.
short.te: స్ట్రీమ్ క్లీనర్ ఎక్స్‌టెన్షన్ ట్విచ్.టివి ప్రకటనలను నిరోధించడంలో మీకు సహాయపడుతుంది.
short.th: ส่วนต่อขยายของสตรีมช่วยให้คุณบล็อกโฆษณา Twitch.tv
short.tr: Akış Temizleyici Uzantısı Twitch.TV reklamlarını engellemenize yardımcı olur.
short.uk: Розширення очищення потоку допомагає блокувати рекламу Twitch.tv.
short.vi: Phần mở rộng Stream Cleaner giúp bạn chặn quảng cáo Twitch.tv.
short.zh_CN: 流清洁器扩展程序可帮助您阻止Twitch.tv广告。
short.zh_TW: 流清潔器擴展程序可幫助您阻止Twitch.tv廣告。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
This Twitch™ adblock extension blocks all the ads on twitch.tv. 

Adblocker for Twitch™ works very well and blocks the pre and mid-roll ads while watching live streams or videos.

How To Use:

> Click on the "Add to Chrome" button to install it.
> After Installation, click on "Extension icon".
> Then you will see a pop-up to enable/disable the Adblocker.

Version 1.3.0 changes
>> Twitch "commercial break in progress or purple screen" bug fixed

Important: This extension does not share/collect any of your personal information and it is developed on the basis of an open-source code.
long.en,en_AU,fi:
This Stream Cleaner adblocker extension blocks all the ads on twitch.tv. 

Adblocker for Twitch™ works very well and blocks the pre and mid-roll ads while watching live streams or videos.

How To Use:

> Click on the "Add to Chrome" button to install it.
> After Installation, click on "Extension icon".
> Then you will see a pop-up to enable/disable the Adblocker.

Benefits of adblocker extension
- Block annoying ads
- Improve page load speed
- Improve browser performance
- Decrease memory usage
- Improve bandwidth usage

Adblocker for Twitch™ enables users to easily get rid of unwanted advertisements and intrusive notifications with just a few clicks.

Version 1.17.0 changes
>> Stream pausing after blocking ads issue fixed

Version 1.16.0 changes
>> Ads not blocking issue fixed

Version 1.15.0 changes
>> Twitch "commercial break in progress or purple screen" bug fixed

Version 1.13.0 changes
>> New Icons
>> Minor bug fixes

Version 1.7.0 changes
>> Minor bug fixes
>> New UI

Important: This extension does not share/collect any of your personal information and it is developed on the basis of an open-source code.
